oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter to Thomas Elsa Jones, President of Fisk University from Bijou Amusement Company President Alfred Starr
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Claiming Space
Business Districts
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Typed letter on Bijou Amusement Company letterhead, signed by Alfred Starr.

Alfred Starr was a member of a prominent Jewish family that owned theatres in primarily African American neighborhoods in Nashville and New Orleans. This letter accompanied a monetary donation to Fisk University.
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Fisk University, John Hope and Aurelia E. Franklin Library, Special Collections
